comment: With the ability to make multiple timers run at once, TimerDroid gives you many options to use with ease. The setup for making new timers is easy, along with the ability to save timers into groups with names. There are also options to change how the alarm feature works when the timer stops. I have not run into any issues when running multiple timers, but the potential use of having multiple timers is huge. TimerDroid gives the ability to run multiple timers with a good set of extra useful features very easily and cleanly.

title: The Best
comment: The best Android timer ...

title: Timer goes off then says unfortunately has stopped, I have a sm-t110 Samsung lite 3
comment: When timer goes off,  the app stops, and timer keeps going, hope that you have abfix for this, its a great app

title: Kept time..
comment: When the alarm went off, the screen changed and I could turn off. I had power cycle my phone shut it up. Since I use timers in a call center this absolutely does not work for me. Uninstalled.

title: Almost perfect
comment: I will not install other timer apps if only timerdroid could save and continue running timers between gadget reboot.  But lately, this app started to crash repeatedly. I can not rely on it any longer. So sad, since it was one of my must-have apps.

title: Love it!
comment: Useful for meditation. Thanks. But pls add some feature to save timer setting to sdcard. And also v.1.1.0 had feature 'Run timer as queue' which was very useful. Can you put it back?

title: Loved this...until started crashing
comment: This was my only timer for tea, cooking, excercise. Love that it allows you to name, save and run multiple at once. But recently it stopped working right, particularly on my new tablet- despite checking tone and vokume in my settings the alarm tone no longer plays, it just is silent,which makes this useless :( please fix so I cangive you 5 stars! Galaxy Tab 3, Android 4.2

title: Sound too loud EVEN IF PHONE MUTED
comment: Like its predecessor, the alarm is not muted or dimmed. This may be very disturbing and annoying. Unusable for tea timing in office!

title: Latest version crashes when alarm goes off.
comment: Love the new look, but miss the one tap ability to start timers. Also crashes for me  running latest version on Droid 4 with ICS.

title: Fails to work
comment: Set timers for the Gym. First timer alarm started with a message that the timer has stopped working with no means of stopping the alarm bar resting my phone!! Tried it again with same results. Great concept, pity it fails. Trying another app now....

title: Super!
comment: If you're looking for a functional timer, look no further! With the last update, it only got better. Thank you soooo much, works like magic!

title: Just what I needed
comment: Make it clear its own notifications for 5 stars.

title: Just what I need
comment: All I want is an effective countdown timer app, something to let me know when to check the centrifuge. This achieves that nicely and with little drain my battery while continuing when I close the screen. Small, light, and perfect.

title: Great
comment: Improved well the other apps Timer and Countdown. Very useful for me and user friendly

title: Great widgets
comment: I looked for ages for a count down timer with 1 touch widgets, this is the one. Great app.

title: Nuff said
comment: Next

title: Irritating
comment: This app works perfect on my nexus7 tablet.  You are able to restart the timer.  But on my samsung gs3, you have to trash the timer, then search for the timer, then start the timer again.  I have too many timers and limited time to be searching for the correct one.  It also closes by itself when timers are finished.  To irritating to use the "keep going off until I turn alarm off" function.  Please make it like the tablet.  I really do like this app!

title: The perfect widget size!
comment: This timer has never failed to get my attention and has never accidently dismissed the alarm. An icon remains in the status bar during each event.    Turning the alarm off is not a single swipe of the screen, but somewhat important alarms should not be. The "factory installed" timer failed several times.   Simple press, customized buttons initiate the timer and labeled buttons also work very well grouped together as a visual reminder of any other related task (with or without a separate time limit.)

title: best timer
comment: just works
Versatile but a little complicated Needs easier way to set adhoc timer.  New app honours quiet better, but doesn't indicate why tones won't preview.
Great, if it would not crash all the time.

title: Ad supported
comment: Their other app didn't have glaring ugly adverts but this does.  Why does an app as simple as a timer have to be ad supported? Who is even clicking on ads in a timer app?   Imagine your cheap digital wristwatch coming with a sim card just so it can download adverts to subject you to. This is ridiculous.

title: Crashed while cooking
comment: Crashed while cooking, i got crispy food now.

title: Cleanest UI and widget there is
comment: Would like option to set different sound tone for each timer. Other than that, immaculate.

title: Pretty good
comment: Needs option to delete favorite timers and also crashes when trying to edit a favorite timer. Add free version would be nice.

title: Total battery hog
comment: Draws 13% of my battery -> remove

title: Simple timer app
comment: Very good and simple timer all. Would be great if there was the option to pause a timer

title: Went downhill
comment: The new look and feel is garbage, this app used to be amazing. U can't even scroll the numbers by swiping and the arrows are so small and glitchy you can barely click them

title: 5 stars ... if it worked
comment: Love the multiple named timers, and the interface is good. But when I try to edit a custom timer, I get a force close error. Keep trying. Will check later to see if it's fixed.

title: Good for what it is
comment: Seemed nice, but max time on countdowns is 24 hrs, which just won't work for my purposes. Had to uninstall.

title: Great app
comment: Best timer app I've used on Android. Both general timers and tea timers. I especially like the widgets. Unfortunately realized I can roll my own with Tasker and I'm working to reduce three number of apps on my phone. That it's the ONLY reason I don't still have this installed.

title: Not quite perfect
comment: Cool app buf needs a Snooze button and it needs to keep going until I turn it off because im a heavy sleeper.

title: Love it!!!
comment: Total life saver!

title: Great
comment: One of the best.

title: Whoooaaa
comment: I'm probably gunna find my self useing this app a lot

title: Neat tidy looking timer
comment: Easy use, common categories all set up.

title: Great timer app!
comment: I like this app. Easy to use, define own timers and for free. Well done!

title: crashes
comment: samsung vibrant froyo 2.2.    been using the prvious version for a few months and like the ability to create and save my own timers. however, the app still crashes when attempting to select an alarm tone.      also, too many clicks needed for starting and stopping timers unlike the previous version. bring back single click start and the X next to running timmers to stop.

title: Good!
comment: This is a nice free timer app. Works great and I love the new widget feature.

title: Nice
comment: Does what it says

title: Crashes Samsung Tab 7 Plus Honeycomb
comment: App FC repeatedly Samsung Tab. Alarm still sounding after FC, requiring reboot. Uninstalling.
